long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shop at over 100 stores and earn up to 35% back in Bitcoin. It's free, simply shop and earn!

DAILY BITCOIN REWARDS

🛍️ Shop & Earn Bitcoin
Get Bitcoin cashback at 100+ hand selected stores.

💸 Up to 35% Bitcoin Cashback
Maximize your rewards for shopping.

💵 Buy Bitcoin
Conveniently buy Bitcoin and withdraw to your wallet.

🚀 100% Free to Use
Simply shop and earn Bitcoin.

🔥 More Ways to Earn
Use the sMiles mobile and web app for extra rewards for steps, games, surveys, tasks, receipt scanning, Bitcoinverse, and more.

⚡ Bitcoin Beats Traditional Rewards
It's extremely scarce and potentially appreciating.

📲 Easy Withdrawals
Transfer rewards from the sMiles iOS or Android app to any Bitcoin Lightning wallet.

GET STARTED

Install the Extension: 
Add sMiles to Chrome.

Link Your Mobile App: 
In the sMiles app, go to Settings > "Link Desktop" and scan the QR code from the extension.

Start Shopping: 
Activate offers and earn Bitcoin.

Withdraw Rewards: 
Use the mobile app to transfer Bitcoin rewards to your Lightning wallet.

Note: 
You'll need the sMiles app on your iOS or Android device to log in and manage rewards. Link your accounts by scanning the QR code in the browser extension using the mobile app.
